Name: Hoverboard Chase
About the game: Help the young skateboarder escape the hands of justice! Escaping on your board, you must collect influence points by performing tricks when entering corners and dodging cops. HoverBoard Chase - 3d hoverboard race where you have to dodge cops, earn influence points for tricks and monitor your character's health bar, because in the end you can get caught! Features of the game: - 3D - Visual Style - Music - Complexity
